attributes.action: Allocate more funding to CAMHs, and priorities the mental health services
attributes.additional_details: The government should consider CAMHS and AMHS in the bills and focus on providing the adequate service to create a happier and healthy population.
attributes.background: Mental health deserves more funding and the same priority given to the physical health sectors. Especially the children's services are incredibly underfunded and understaffed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action: 

Review provision and increase funding for children's mental health services:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597653

Provide more funds and resources to Mental Health services & charities:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595467
